name: black gown
description:
cw: depictions of anxiety and mental health issues.

black gown, by fleursy game.

black gown is a short, (10 minute playthrough) atmospheric and experimental visual novel about having an anxiety attack in a moving car. it was made just because i found it cathartic to make.  it includes exciting features like:

  • choices (kind of)
  • graphics
  • music (sad music)
  • sound effects

its free to download and you can download the song too if you like it.

i am thinking about making a sequel to black gown called white robe.  look out for that, or don't,  it's whatever
